last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 13
last_episode_to_air.overview: Devastated by news of Fiona's engagement, Glen races off, only to be involved in a life-or-death emergency.

name: Critical
overview: The Major Trauma Centre is a state-of-the-art unit which treats only the most gravely ill or seriously injured. Whether that patient lives or dies is determined by knife-edge decisions and procedures, but can the diverse team of medical professionals knit together and rise to the challenge? Our team hold a life in their hands but in every case they face the agonisingly real fear that it could slip through their fingers.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The team have to work around the clock inside a state-of-the-art Major Trauma Centre.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Time is running out as the team treat a woman who has suffered a horrific fall. Amid all the action, Fiona tries to adapt to working with her ex, Glen.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Emotions run high when the team fight to revive a cyclist involved in a serious collision. Glen makes a bold decision, but will it be enough?

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Stress levels rocket when, while treating a badly beaten man, the team face a nightmare scenario that sends the Major Trauma Centre into lockdown.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: There is confusion in the  the operating theatre after Lorraine returns to work, taking control from Glen as trauma team leader to treat a woman who has a gunshot wound.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The tension between Glen and Lorraine continues to increase they go to the aid of a troubled patient who has jumped off the hospital's atrium walkway.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A shock is in store for the team when they treat an agitated patient who has been involved in a car crash. Glen delivers an overdue apology to Fiona, too.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The team feel the pressure more than ever when they treat a horrifically burned patient. Glen grows closer to Fiona, too, shedding light on his army days

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The prognosis does not look good as the team attempt to save a teenage drowning victim. It results in a standoff between Glen and Clive. A bold move is made by Fiona.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The victim of a dog attack is brought in with the dog still attached to him.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: There are some obstacles to deal with as the team tackle one of their trickiest cases yet.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Stretched to the limit, the team hit the road to treat multiple victims involved in a traffic accident. Fiona, meanwhile, tries to keep her engagement a secret.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Devastated by news of Fiona's engagement, Glen races off, only to be involved in a life-or-death emergency.
